oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ultrasonographic findings in cattle with pleuropneumonia
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Braun, U.
Pusterla, N.
Fl√ºckiger, M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: pleuropneumonia
ultrasonographic
radiographic
indigestion
fever
tachypnoea
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The clinical, ultrasonographic and radiographic findings in three cows and one bull with pleuropneumonia are described. All the animals had fever, indigestion, tachypnoea and abnormal lung sounds. Full article published in Veterinary Record (1997) 141, 12-17
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1997; 14
